LanguageData.onStartMapTooltip: If true, Mechanoid raids will warn 2,700 ticks in advance and arrive after 30,000 ticks (approx. 12hrs). If false, warnings occur between 840,000-960,000 ticks with arrival between 1,080,000-2,100,000 ticks.
LanguageData.autoClearOnStartMapTooltip: If true: Starting map flag auto-clears when leaving initial map (fixes Odyssey DLC/RimWorld Together conflict). If false: Starting map flag persists until manually cleared.
LanguageData.enableMechanoidRaidsTooltip: If true: Forces mechanoid raids regardless of quest completion or Grav engine. If false: Disables all mechanoid raids under any conditions.
LanguageData.modifyMapWarningTimersTooltip: If true: Allows custom raid warning times If false: Uses default warning timers
LanguageData.modifyMapRaidTimersTooltip: If true: Allows custom raid arrival times If false: Uses default arrival timers
LanguageData.modifyFireRaidTooltip: If true: Allows custom raid parameters If false: Uses default parameters: threat points 5000, threat multiplier 1.5 Note: Final threat points = max(threat points, threat multiplier * map default threat value)
LanguageData.modifyRaidIntervalTimerTooltip: If true: Allows custom raid interval If false: Uses default raid interval of 30,000
